    • Method Detail

      • createCourse

        public void createCourse(java.lang.String aClassName,
                         int aCdn,
                         float aGraderBudget,
                         float aTaBudget,
                         float labBudget)
                  throws InputException
        Creates Course object and saves it to the persistence layer
        Parameters:
        aClassName - name for the proposed Course
        aCdn - unique identifier number for the Course
        aGraderBudget - monetary budget per semester for the Course allocated to graders
        aTaBudget - monetary budget per semester for the Course allocated to tutorial TAs
        labBudget - monetary budget per semester for the Course allocated to lab TAs
        Throws:
        InputException

      • modifyTaBudget

        public void modifyTaBudget(Course course,
                           float cost)
                    throws InputException
        Decrements tutorial budget as a consequence of a job being published. Should be used in conjunction with, and particular before the use of ApplicationController's addJobToSystem() function
        Parameters:
        course -
        cost -
        Throws:
        InputException - corresponding to a budget error
